Name: Sett
AbilityDescription:
Sett begins charging up, becoming immune to crowd control and gaining a health shield for 2.5 seconds. After the shield breaks or at the end of its duration, he unleashes a blast in a cone at the most enemies in range, dealing physical damage to all enemies inside. The damage increases up depending on how long he charged.

Shield Health : 400 / 550 / 1500

Min Attack Damage : 120% / 125% / 200%

Max Attack Damage : 240% / 250% / 400%
